模块 Fianalproject
程序包 application

类 AdvancedRobot

java.lang.Object
application.Robot
application.AdvancedRobot
public class AdvancedRobot extends Robot
The AdvancedRobot class represents a robot with advanced movement logic. This robot can randomly change its direction and move within a given area. The AdvancedRobot class represents a robot with advanced motion logic that can detect and absorb BasicRobots It extends the Robot class The robot will try to move in the current direction, but if it encounters an obstacle or boundary, it will move randomly Change direction until you find a clear path or exhaust all attempts. to remain within the boundaries.
版本:
1.0
作者:
[SHEN FANGJIE]
另请参阅:

  • 构造器详细资料

    • AdvancedRobot

      public AdvancedRobot(int x, int y, Direction direction)
      Constructs a new AdvancedRobot object with specified starting position, direction, and color. Inherits from the abstract class robot
      参数:
      x - the initial X coordinate of the robot
      y - the initial Y coordinate of the robot
      direction - the initial direction of the robot

  • 方法详细资料

    • move

      public void move()
      Moves the robot. Each time this method is called, there is a 50% chance the robot will randomly change its direction, then it moves one step forward in the current direction. If moving would cause the robot to go out of bounds, it will randomly adjust its direction and be constrained within the boundary.
      指定者:
      move 在类中 Robot

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the state of the robot to its initial state. The specific behavior is defined by the parent class Robot.
      覆盖:
      reset 在类中 Robot

    • createRandom

      public static AdvancedRobot createRandom(int maxX, int maxY)
      Creates a new AdvancedRobot object with random position and direction.
      参数:
      maxX - the maximum X coordinate (exclusive), determining the possible maximum X position of the robot
      maxY - the maximum Y coordinate (exclusive), determining the possible maximum Y position of the robot
      返回:
      a newly created AdvancedRobot object
